page.title: 03CURRIE RELIGION
page.content: There are several churches in our area. One of them is Currie Kirk. I went to Currie Kirk to interview the minister. He has been minister of the Kirk for three years. He works about thirteen hours a day and he enjoys what he does, although sometimes it gets a little hectic. On average 450 people go to the church on a Sunday. He has one full time and one part time paid helper as well as 100 Sunday school helpers, 100 elders and a caretaker called the Beadle. In his spare time he likes gardening, badminton and fishing. He also watches Aberdeen F.C. football matches. Once the King of Siam came to a wedding at the Kirk in 1900.
